security: Revealing employment details (GS levels, EOD dates) of current staff could pose a security risk and violate privacy.
summary: This document contains personnel information including the names, family relationships, and employment details of CIA staff members and mentions a security review of Clare Boothe Luce.
summary_one_paragraph: This record, dated August 15, 1968, lists information about CIA personnel, including James Donald Duffey, Jr., his parents James D. Duffey (father, GS-14 employee, EOD 1948) and Gertrude E. Duffey (mother, GS-9 employee, EOD 1960), and John J. Shea (GS-15 employee, EOD 1956). It also notes a past security review concerning Clare Boothe Luce, indicating that she was of CI interest in May 1958, which was cancelled in September 1958, and that she was granted a CSA for contact on August 8, 1963.
title: Personnel Information and Security Review
